dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2540 IH: Flood Prevention Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to allow the District of Columbia to receive Federal funding under such Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Flood Prevention Act of 2017.

section.header: Eligibility of District of Columbia for Federal funding under the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972
section.text: Section 304(4) of the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 (16 U.S.C. 1453(4)) is amended by inserting the District of Columbia, after the term also includes.
